title: New York City Sets Covid-19 Vaccine Mandate for Private-Sector Workers
sub_head: Mayor Bill de Blasio says new requirement goes into effect later this month
body:
New York City will require all private-sector workers be fully vaccinated against Covid-19, in what Mayor Bill de Blasio described as a first in the nation measure.
The surprise announcement Monday drew immediate pushback from some business leaders, as employment experts predicted the rule would face legal challenges.
